summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of North Eighty-third Street, in the City of Seattle, from Greenwood Avenue to Woodland Park Avenue, by constructing cement walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 1869 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
